description: Ryou and Yumi`s kouhai and Soushi`s adoptive sister. Because she`s adopted by the Minashiro family at a young age, Karin has known since childhood of the real situation on Earth. She`s also part of the L-Plan, but not in a combat role. On the first day of the Festum invasion of Tatsumiya Island, she`s killed on her way to the Burg Fafner storage facility. She has a crush on her one-year senior Ryou Masaoka.
name: Kuramae Karin
